title: Recently we have seen 5th generation fighters. What other 'new generation' tanks, helicopters, and ships can we expect? - Quora

response.answer_text: On large ships and some land based platforms, we have been playing around with directed energy weapons for quite some time now.  Lasers that shoot down incoming aircraft are slowly coming online.  We are at the baby steps currently but evidence suggests that we will be crawling and maybe walking soon.  We canceled the airborne laser program few years ago, but it was was promising.  It's a huge learning curve but one we are attempting and if it all works out, it will be a game changer if we can master it.  Some of our newest ships have massive capacity to generate more electric power in anticipation of these new weapons becoming a reality.

- Helicopter: Stealth Helicopter (one used in Bin Laden's raid for example) - Tank: BVR capable tank (M1A3, K), 140 mm gun (Armata, Oplot, Type 99), more reliable active defence and autoloader (many) - Ship: Smaller, more literal-friendly vessel with similar capability to frigate and destroyer - often in form of modular corvette (many) and super high tech speed boat (Independent Class) - Large ship/destroyer: Much better air defence and ballistic missile counter measure (Laser CIWS, Railgun) and improved anti-ship capability (hypersonic Ashm) - Submarine: advanced diesel submarine   - Artillery: Intercontinental artillery system (Prompt Global Strike program)
